Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, everyone, to this year's <RED>Fishing
Tournament</RED>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Allow me to introduce our hopeful heroes of rod
and reel!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #1, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME0>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #2, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME1>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #3, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME2>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #4, <MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME3>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry #<MOJI3>, <CHARANAME3>!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Contestants will have a total of <BLUE>4 hours</BLUE>, and
may fish at any fishing point they like. Now,
without any further ado...
<PAGE>
Let's get fishing!
Time's up!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well done, everyone. We will now judge
everyone's catches.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ladies and gentlemen, it seems the judging has
concluded. I will now announce the winners.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The winner for most fish caught is...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME4>, with <MOJI0>
fish caught! Congratulations!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHARANAME4>, with <MOJI0> fish caught!
Congratulations!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
In 2nd place, <CHARANAME1>!
In 3rd place, <CHARANAME2>!
In 4th place, <CHARANAME3>!
<PAGE>
An excellent showing all around.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, the winner for the largest fish caught...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MOJI1> Farm's <CHARANAME4>, who
caught a fish measuring <MOJI2> cm. 
Congratulations!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHARANAME4>, who caught a fish measuring
<MOJI2> cm. Congratulations!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations, everyone, on your splendid
catches!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, let's begin the awards ceremony.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, as the winner of both the Most
Fish and Biggest Fish categories, would you
please step forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will the winner of the Most Fish category,
<MYNAME>, please step forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will the winner of the Biggest Fish category,
<MYNAME>, please step forward?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations. Please accept this
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> as the grand prize for
your achievement!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
That brings us to the close of this year's <RED>Fishing
Tournament</RED>. Thank you for coming, ladies and
gentlemen. We hope to see you again next year.

I shouldn't go this way. There's no place to fish
over there.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm doin' pretty handily. Are the fish biting for
you?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Shh! Stay quiet, please.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong? If you don't hurry up and find a
spot, you won't have any time left to fish.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All righty, then! This is the spot I'm gonna use
today.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hn? Here to check up on the competition, eh?
Feelin' pretty confident today, aren'tcha?

<NAME_MOB_SCHULTZ>
...

<NAME_MOB_MINA>
Are you sure you want to waste your time
talking to me?

<NAME_MOB_JULIAN>
I suggest you hurry up and find a spot to fish
before time runs out.

<NAME_MOB_MARCIA>
Nothing much is biting today, is it...

<NAME_MOB_MARCO>
Fishing requires patience and endurance...neither
of which I have. I'm just getting bored.

<NAME_MOB_ANDRE>
Ssshhhhh. The fish are finally starting to bite.
I'm having a real moment, here!
